author.bio: use linux or i will bite your ankles off.
author.bio_html: use linux or i will bite your ankles off.

body: basically reddit loads things in sequence. first the post title, then the image, then the first comment and its children, then the second comment and it's children, and so forth, until the screen is fully loaded. then it loads as you scroll. ruqqus just does it all at once it seems.
body_html: basically reddit loads things in sequence. first the post title, then the image, then the first comment and its children, then the second comment and it's children, and so forth, until the screen is fully loaded. then it loads as you scroll. ruqqus just does it all at once it seems.
